item.title: Predicting property prices
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 3.1 Missing values 3.2 Correlation 4 Regression trees - why use it? 4.1 Revising variable importance 5 Results 6 What does it mean? 1 Summary To see the code used in this post, visit my kernel on kaggle in R Markdown format. 2 Question Let’s say that you have a house in Ames, Iowa (that’s where the dataset is from).
